name: .QFX File Extension
summary: Learn about .QFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Financial data format used for importing data into Quicken financial software; may include account balances, transactions, and other information recorded in a standardized format; similar to the .OFX format, but is a proprietary format used by Quicken.

content: QFX files are generated by various financial institutions such as banks and credit card companies. They can be downloaded from the Internet using Quicken's Web Connect feature.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
